FuncDef:
The radius-server coa-request hw-policy-name daa coexist-with-user command allows the user attributes also to take effect if they are delivered with a DAA template in the HW-Policy-Name (26-95) attribute through the same CoA message which may also carry other DAA service attributes.
The undo radius-server coa-request hw-policy-name daa coexist-with-user command restores the default configuration.
By default, if both user attributes and DAA service attributes are delivered through the same CoA message, the device does not process the user attributes.
CLIs: undo radius-server coa-request hw-policy-name daa coexist-with-user
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To allow the user attributes also to take effect if they are delivered with a DAA template in the HW-Policy-Name (26-95) attribute through the same CoA message which may also carry other DAA service attributes, run the radius-server coa-request hw-policy-name daa coexist-with-user command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
